title: Roadmap to Calculus
desc: I made a nine videos long course on youtube. It clearly lays out the foundations of Calculus ina visual way. I made the visuals using manim. It is in Nepali language.

title: Website for Archana
desc: Archana helps street dogs in Nepal. She provides food and shelter for the dogs and has helped over 120 dogs already. I helped her by making a website so anybody can read her story and donate.

title: Content for MAC
desc: I am making explainer videos for Mathematics Achievement Center (MAC), YSU. So far, I have covered a couple of topics in college algebra. The videos are visually attractive and explain the topics in detail.
